item.title: Hello, World!
item.description: Firstly, apologies for the cliched title. I just couldn’t resist 😺. I have lost count of the number of times I have started a blog, only for me to give up on it later. And yet, here I am, trying once again. Well, somebody smart did once say — “The definition of insanity is doing the same thing over and over again, but expecting different results.

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi there 👋 I am Vighnesh Shenoy, and I am a software developer from India. I graduated with a double major in Computer Science & Mathematics from BITS Pilani, Hyderabad Campus in July, 2021. And I am currently working as a software engineer at Microsoft. Unsolicited trivia about me - I like reading technical blogs, discovering new & interesting open-source projects, occassionally listening to podcasts and quizzing.
